title: Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies: Simulation Education for Interprofessional Collaboration in Healthcare

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of healthcare systems and professional roles
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Effective interprofessional communication strategies are applicable in practical evaluations by over 80% of learners.
Over 90% of learners correctly perform role allocation and collaboration protocols in VR simulations.
Post-training surveys confirm that over 75% of learners have improved their understanding of other professions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
